com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client
Class RhizosphereModelPosition

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.RhizosphereModelPosition

public class RhizosphereModelPosition
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

Simple wrapper to declare an explicit positioning of a Rhizosphere model within the visualization viewport.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)

RhizosphereModelPosition

Method Detail

create

public static final RhizosphereModelPosition create(RhizosphereModelRef modelRef,
                                                    int top,
                                                    int left)
Creates a new position object.

Parameters:
modelRef - A reference to the model whose position is being declared.
top - Top position, in pixels, of the top-left corner of the model rendering from the top-left corner of the visualization universe.
left - Left position, in pixels, of the top-left corner of the model rendering from the top-left corner of the visualization universe.
Returns:
A new position instance.
